connect.title: Connect Your Archive Account
connect.description: Enter your public Internet Archive screen name to create a personalized dashboard with your stats, uploads, and favorites.
connect.privacy: This feature only uses public data and does not require you to log in. Your screen name is saved locally in your browser.
connect.confirmDescription: We found some public uploads associated with this name. Please select your specific uploader identifier below to confirm your account.
connect.noIdentifierFound: Could not automatically determine an uploader ID. You can still proceed if the items shown are yours.
connect.errorNotFound: Sorry, we could not find any public uploads associated with that name. Please check the spelling and try again.
